title: The world reacts to Pope Benedict XVI’s death
description: World leaders pay tribute to Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI, who died at 95 in the Vatican.

title: Celebrations kick off in Asia as world enters 2023
description: Asia celebrates a restriction-free New Year after two years of COVID disruptions, as the world enters 2023.

title: 2022: The year Taliban cracked down on women’s rights
description: The year 2022 saw the Taliban imposing restrictions on women's rights, bringing back the memory of its past rule.

title: China’s Xi says country’s COVID prevention enters new phase
description: The president says Beijing overcame unprecedented challenges in the battle against COVID amid a new wave of cases China.

title: Pelé meant the world to us Africans
description: The Brazilian superstar rose to fame just as Africans nourished Black pride in their fight against white supremacy.

title: Photos: The life of Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI
description: Benedict, the first pope in 600 years to step down as the Bishop of Rome, died at the age of 95.

title: Explosions heard in central Kyiv
description: Ten explosions were heard in the centre of Ukraine's capital as air raid sirens sounded nationwide.

title: 2022: A year in pictures
description: A visual timeline of key events defining the past 12 months.

title: Photos: Removing rebel-planted landmines in Senegal’s Casamance
description: Demining operations happen amid the still ongoing conflict in Senegal between the government and rebel groups.

title: Who are Al Nassr, Cristiano Ronaldo’s new team?
description: Portugal captain has joined the Riyadh-based side on a deal until June 2025.

title: Croatia to switch to euro, enter passport-free Schengen zone
description: Croatia will join the eurozone on January 1, 2023 as the currency bloc's 20th member.

title: Obituary: Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI, pontiff who resigned
description: Benedict, who died at the age of 95, in 2013 became the first pope in 600 years to step down, citing old age.

title: Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI dies at age 95
description: Vatican says former pope died in his residence at the Mater Ecclesiae monastery.

title: How Ghana, Africa’s rising star, ended up in economic turmoil
description: The West African nation is a major cocoa and gold exporter, so why is it battling its worst economic crisis in decades?

title: Man arrested for murder of four Idaho university students
description: The 28-year-old suspect was charged with first-degree murder in the stabbing deaths of the students.

title: Guyana’s president: Are new oil discoveries a curse?
description: President Irfaan Ali discusses if green economies are unfair to Guyana's oil explorations and development plans.

title: For Senegalese landmine victims, a forgotten conflict lives on
description: The 40-year war between Senegal and rebels in its Casamance region has left legacies of landmines with diverse impacts.

title: Ex-Botswana President Khama to challenge arrest warrant: Lawyer
description: Former leader, who is now in South Africa, accused of possessing illegal firearms.

title: Venezuela opposition removes interim President Guaido
description: Three opposition groups backed the bill to remove Juan Guaido and create a 5-member commission to manage foreign assets.

title: Four killed in police checkpoint attack in Egypt’s Ismailia
description: No group has claimed responsibility for attack that took place in Ismailia city on the western side of the Suez Canal.

title: Is a global recession looming in 2023?
description: Will a global economic slowdown happen in the new year? A panel of experts offers their insights about what to expect.

title: ‘Trailblazer for all women’: TV anchor Barbara Walters dies at 93
description: Walters was the first woman to become a US TV news superstar, interviewing rulers, royalty and entertainers for decades.

title: Mali sentences 46 Ivory Coast soldiers to 20 years in prison
description: A court in the West African country has jailed the soldiers for conspiring against the government.

title: Share data, WHO again tells China during COVID surge talks
description: The World Health Organization said it has 'again' asked Chinese officials for regular sharing of real-time data.

title: Stories that defined the US and Canada in 2022
description: The year 2022 saw former US President Trump facing legal action, Pope Francis apologising in Canada and mass shootings.

title: Russia grants tax amnesty to encourage troops fighting in Ukraine
description: Russian forces can also receive 'rewards and gifts' for their services in Ukraine, according to new decree.

title: Portugal’s Cristiano Ronaldo joins Saudi Arabia club Al Nassr
description: Ronaldo's contract with Al Nassr has been estimated by media to be worth more than 200m euros ($214.5m).

title: UN seeks ICJ opinion on Israel’s illegal occupation of Palestine
description: The resolution will see International Court of Justice give opinion on Israel's occupation of Palestinian territory.

title: North Korea fires ballistic missiles towards Sea of Japan: Report
description: Japan’s Coast Guard said the missiles splashed down in the Sea of Japan, according to Japanese media reports.
